page.title: 13Village Hall
page.content: Within the 12 km block lies only the very small village of Kynnersley.It seems the only way to create viable groups for clubs and social activities is for the neighbouring parishes of Preston,Eyton,Tibberton,Crudgington and Horton to pool their resources. Despite the sparse population there are a variety of clubs and societies. Kynnersley Village Hall,the venue for many club meetings may be booked by groups or individuals for a small fee and is often used in conjunction with villagers from Preston.Events held in the hall include discos,whist drives,jumble sales and barn dances. A number of horses are kept in this area,mainly as childrens pets for riding, some of the children belong to the North Shropshire Pony Club. There is no fox hunting in this area.
